Text:
Guys sorry for no instructions.. so...

1 - Download (of course)

2 - Create a REG file with:

------------------------------------------------------
Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeElectronic ArtsEA GamesBattlefield Play4Free]
"Installation Dir"="D:\Downloads\Battlefield Play4Free"
"Language"="EN"
---------------------------------------

3 - Just put the path where you downloaded it.

4 - Go to http://battlefield.play4free.com/en/ and log in and install extension and play :D

Enjoy!
